I do agree with the opinion that shopping is not always enjoyable. Nowadays many young people like to do their shopping. But, isn't it a kind of entertaintmententertainment?

In the first place, I would like to point out that to go shopping does not always mean to buy something. A lot of people, especially women, go to do their shopping only for fanfun. In such a situation they are looking for something that they might buy.
But, what about real shopping.? I mean shopping with a real purpose.

For example, emagineimagine that you are a bride and you have to buy an appropriate suitoutfit. It's a real nightmare when you try to match everything: from the size, the colour to the sawings of the suit that is acceptable for everyone.
On the other hand it is a great achievement for you when you buy the suit that is perfect for everyone.
To sum up, I would like to say that shopping is enjoyable when you are going only for fanfun. But, when you want to buy something special it's a real nightmare.
